review: I had little to no trouble hooking up the Fire TV Stick to my television.  Finding programing on the Fire TV Stick is difficult unless you have an app on another devise such as an iPad or tablet.  Overall, I would purchase this devise again.

review: Fantastic device!!  We took the Fire TV Stick with us on a short trip just after receiving it.  Plugged it into the TV at a Fairfield Inn; it booted up knowing my name, etc.  Next thing you know we are watching our favorite Prime TV and Netflix!  We are currently in Jamacia and using the device.  Internet is not as reliable, but that is not an issue with the Fire TV Stick.  Love it, love it - especially for the small price!!
